thread.title: Céline Dion photobombed a couple's proposal and her reaction was priceless
thread.title_full: Céline Dion photobombed a couple's proposal and her reaction was priceless

author: April Hautea
title: Céline Dion photobombed a couple's proposal and her reaction was priceless
text:
Céline Dion photobombed a couple's proposal and her reaction was priceless 324 By April Hautea 2017-02-08 12:51:09 UTC 
Céline Dion knows how to belt a love song, so what better place to propose to your girlfriend than at Dion's Las Vegas residency show? SEE ALSO: Newborn baby becomes ideal wingman in father's surprise proposal 
Austin McMillan and her boyfriend, Nick Janevsky, attended a pre-show meet-and-greet on Friday to meet McMillan's favorite performer. When the couple got in front of the singer, Janevsky got down on one knee, pulled out a ring, and proposed. 
McMillan said in an Instagram post that the events of that evening came as a surprise — but from the pictures, no one was more surprised than Dion. Just check out the look on her face. A photo posted by austin mcmillan (@austinmcmillan) on Feb 4, 2017 at 7:01pm PST A photo posted by austin mcmillan (@austinmcmillan) on Feb 5, 2017 at 9:06am PST 
"Céline was shocked and I was, too. She was super sweet and wished us a long and happy marriage like she had with her husband," McMillian said in an ET interview. "Then [she] invited herself to the wedding!" 
We hope Dion can take a break from her Vegas show to attend the couple's nuptials. Maybe she'll even sing the couple's first dance song.
